mapper.insert: insert into review(review_title, review_contents, review_rating, review_writer, review_date, review_movieid) values(#{REVIEW_TITLE}, #{REVIEW_CONTENTS}, #{REVIEW_RATING}, #{REVIEW_WRITER}, #{REVIEW_DATE}, ${REVIEW_MOVIEID})
